landing.bio: I am a collaborative and self-motivated person with adequate software and interpersonal skills who is always willing to take responsibility to go beyond what is expected.

Projects.position: On-site Search Result Accuracy Evaluation Automation Program
Projects.aboutWork1: Speeded up preliminary accuracy evaluation of results of the top monthly queries
Projects.aboutWork2: Built an RPA from scratch with Python to automatically inspect result accuracy
Projects.aboutWork3: Increased efficiency from examining 600 queries in 1 day to 24k+ queries in 15 minutes

Projects.position: Where2Study and Busy Times Patterns at NTU studyroom
Projects.aboutWork1: Addressed overcrowding issues in the study room and the Uni library
Projects.aboutWork2: Scraped and preprocessed 12k+ courses data using AWS EC2, ParseHub, and Python
Projects.aboutWork3: Built two programs which can visualize students flow patterns and search for not-in-use classrooms as an alternative studying place

Projects.position: Age Prediction with Blurry Image by DeepLearning
Projects.organization: Final GROUP Project, Computer Programming (NTU EE1004_03)
Projects.aboutWork1: Tackled low-quality images recognition problem in CCTV
Projects.aboutWork2: Designed 6 different training approaches with a pre-trained CNN model
Projects.aboutWork3: Acquired preliminary results of 2 models with the observation of imbalanced dataset

education.degree: B.S. in Information Management (minor: Mechanical Engineering)
Summer Program-“Quantitative Decision Making for Business Operation” Module

interests.paragraphOne: Besides programming, I am also interested in Finance and Cloud computing.
interests.paragraphTwo: Currently, I am taking online courses and trainings, such as Investment, Financial Management, and Cloud Support Associate career pathway on AWS Education.

link.name: Cloud Support Associate career pathway training on AWS Edu
